name: Mapjects Client Webparts File
summary: File used by Mapjects GRYD, an operations visualization software package used for security management, energy management, and logistics; stores a client configuration of "Webparts," which are widgets that can be mashed together to display integrated visualizations; used for configuring rich client Web interfaces.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Mapjects GRYD with Mapjects yPlug plug-in

linux.display_name: Mapjects GRYD with Mapjects yPlug plug-in
